skill.name: employment-contract-templates
skill.description: Create employment contracts, offer letters, and HR policy documents following legal best practices. Use when drafting employment agreements, creating HR policies, or standardizing employment documentation.
skill.summary: Create employment contracts, offer letters, and HR policy documents following legal best practices. ...
skill.author: unknown

security_audit.summary: No code execution, network access, or file system access patterns were found. The content is static legal template text. No data theft or malicious behaviors detected.

content.value_statement: You need clear, consistent employment documents. This skill provides ready templates with structured sections and legal best practice guidance.
actual_capabilities: Provide an employment offer letter template
Provide an employee handbook policy section template
List key legal considerations for employment documents
Share practical do and do not guidance for HR documentation
limitations: Not legal advice or jurisdiction specific
Does not validate enforceability or compliance
No automated data collection or form filling
No negotiation or custom clause drafting beyond templates

use_cases.title: Standardize offer letters
use_cases.description: Create a consistent offer letter format for new hires with required sections and contingencies.

use_cases.title: Draft basic agreements
use_cases.description: Produce a starter employment agreement to review with counsel for early hires.

use_cases.title: Update handbook policies
use_cases.description: Add or refresh core handbook policy sections with structured wording.

prompt_templates.title: Create offer letter
prompt_templates.prompt: Draft an offer letter template for a full time software engineer in the United States with salary, equity, benefits, and at will language.

prompt_templates.title: Employment agreement
prompt_templates.prompt: Provide an employment agreement template for a fixed term role with confidentiality, IP assignment, and termination sections.

prompt_templates.title: Handbook policies
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a handbook policy section covering anti harassment, attendance, PTO, and acceptable use.

prompt_templates.title: Customize clauses
prompt_templates.prompt: Customize the employment agreement template for a remote role with travel requirements and a 12 month non solicitation clause.

output_examples.input: Create an offer letter template for a marketing manager role with standard benefits and a background check contingency.
output: Position details with role, location, start date, and employment type
Compensation section with salary, bonus, and equity placeholders
Contingencies and at will employment language

best_practices: Consult qualified legal counsel for jurisdiction specific rules
Customize terms to match role, location, and employment type
Keep signed copies of finalized documents
anti_patterns: Copying clauses that conflict with local law

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, it is a text based skill that works in all three platforms.

faq.question: What are the limits of the templates?
faq.answer: They are general starting points and are not jurisdiction specific or legally binding advice.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with HR systems?
faq.answer: You can copy the text into your HR system, but there is no direct integration.

faq.question: Does it access or store my data?
faq.answer: No, it contains only static templates and does not access files or networks.

faq.question: What if a clause seems missing?
faq.answer: Add it and confirm with legal counsel, then update your internal template set.

faq.question: How does this compare to paid legal services?
faq.answer: It provides drafts only, while paid services offer legal review and advice.
